Translations.Text: ve aapas mein kis vishay mein prashn kar rahe hain
bahut badee soochana ke vishay mein
jisamen matabhed kar rahe hain
nishchay ve jaan lenge
phir nishchay ve jaan lenge
kya hamane dharatee ko paalana nahin banaaya
aur parvaton ko mekh
tatha tumhen jode-jode paida kiya
tatha tumhaaree nidra ko sthirata (aaraam) banaaya
aur raat ko vastr banaaya
aur din ko kamaane ke lie banaaya
tatha hamane tumhaare oopar saat drdh aakaash banaaye
aur ek damakata deep (soory) banaaya
aur baadalon se moosalaadhaar varsha kee
taaki usase ann aur vanaspati upajaayen
aur ghane-ghane baag
nishchay nirnay (faisale) ka din nishchit hai
jis din soor mein phoonka jaayega. phir tum dalon hee dalon mein chale aaoge
aur aakaash khol diya jaayega, to usamen dvaar hee dvaar ho jaayenge
aur parvat chala diye jaayenge, to ve marichika ban jaayenge
vaastav mein, narak ghaat mein hai
jo duraachaariyon ka sthaan hai
jisamen ve asankhy varshon tak rahenge
usamen thanadee tatha pey (peene kee cheez) nahin chakhenge
sivaaye garm paanee aur peep rakt ke
ye poora-poora pratiphal hai
nihsandeh ve haisaab kee aasha nahin rakhate the
tatha ve hamaaree aayaton ko jhuthalaate the
aur hamane sab vishay likhakar surakshit kar liye hain
to chakho, ham tumhaaree yaatana adhik hee karate rahenge
vaastav mein, jo darate hain unheen ke lie saphalata hai
baag tatha angoor hain
aur navayuvati kumaariyaan
aur chhalakate pyaale
usamen bakavaas aur mithya baaten nahin sunenge
ye tumhaare paalanahaar kee or se bharapoor puraskaar hai
jo aakaash, dharatee tatha jo unake beech hai, sabaka ati karunaamay paalanahaar hai. jisase baat karane ka ve saahas nahin kar sakenge
jis din rooh (jibreel) tatha farishte panktiyon mein khade honge, vahee baat kar sakega jise rahamaan (allaah) aagya dega aur saheeh baat karega
vah din nihsandeh hona hee hai. atah jo chaahe apane paalanahaar kee or (jaane ka) thikaana bana le
hamane tumhen sameep yaatana se saavadhaan kar diya, jis din insaan apana karatoot dekhega aur kaafir (vishvaasaheen) kahega ki kaash main mittee ho jaata
shapath hai un farishton kee jo doobakar (praan) nikaalate hain
aur jo saralata se (praan) nikaalate hain
aur jo tairate rahate hain
phir jo aage nikal jaate hain
phir jo kaary kee vyavastha karate hain
jis din dharatee kaanpegee
jisake peechhe hee doosaree kamp aa jaayegee
us din bahut-se dil dhadak rahe honge
unakee aankhen jhukee hongee
ve kahate hain ki kya ham phir pahalee sthiti mein laaye jaayenge
jab ham (bhurabhuree) (khokhalee) asthiyaan (haddiyaan) ho jaayenge
unhonne kahaah tab to is vaapasee mein kshati hai
bas vah ek jhidakee hogee
tab ve akasmaat dharatee ke oopar honge
(he nabee!) kya tumhen moosa ka samaachaar pahuncha
jab pavitr vaadee tuva mein use usake paalanahaar ne pukaara
firaun ke paas jao, vah vidrohee ho gaya hai
tatha usase kaho ki kya tum pavitr hona chaahoge
aur main tumhen tumhaare paalanahaar kee seedhee raah dikhaoon, to tum daroge
phir use sabase bada chinh (chamatkaar) dikhaaya
to usane use jhuthala diya aur baat na maanee
phir prayaas karane laga
phir logon ko ekatr kiya, phir pukaara
aur kahaah main tumhaara param paalanahaar hoon
to allaah ne use sansaar tatha paralok kee yaatana mein gher liya
vaastav mein, isamen usake lie shiksha hai, jo darata hai
kya tumhen paida karana kathin hai athava aakaash ko, jise usane banaaya
usakee chhat oonchee kee aur chauras kiya
aur usakee raat ko andheree tatha din ko ujaala kiya
aur isake baad dharatee ko phailaaya
aur usase paanee aur chaara nikaala
aur parvaton ko gaad diya
tumhaare tatha tumhaare pashuon ke laabh ke lie
to jab pralay aayegee
us din insaan apana karatoot yaad karega
aur dekhane vaale ke lie narak saamane kar dee jaayegee
to jisane vidroh kiya
aur saansaarik jeevan ko praathamikta dee
to narak hee usaka aavaas hogee
parantu, jo apane paalanahaar kee mahaanata se dara tatha apane aapako manamaanee karane se roka
to nishchay hee usaka aavaas svarg hai
ve aapase prashn karate hain ki vah samay kab aayega
tum usakee charcha mein kyon pade ho
usake hone ke samay ka gyaan tumhaare paalanahaar ke paas hai
tum to use saavadhaan karane ke lie ho, jo usase darata hai
ve jis din usaka darshan karenge, unhen aisa lagega ki ve sansaar mein ek sandhya ya usake savere se adhik nahin thahare
